designer.title: Designer
designer.text: Post your fabric requirements on the site, and receive updates whenever the fabric you need is listed on the site.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.text: List your excess fabric on the site, and work with talented designers to make new clothes. Earn more money from unused fabric, and be more eco-friendly and sustainable.

individuals.title: Individuals
individuals.text: Put up your old clothes for auction and get offers from upcycling designers and pre-worn fabric processors. Your old clothes get processed into new ones, and you earn money from clothes that wouldâ€™ve otherwise ended up in landfills. You will also get notified about sustainable designers in your city
